original_title: The Best of Taz: Survive if He Lets You!
overview: This is the newest in the Taz video series from the summer and the fall of 1998. Features the unbelievable brawls between Taz and Bam Bam Bigelow. As an added bonus, this video features some of Tazâ€™s best matches from and against Chris Benoit, Chris Jericho, Lance Storm,  Jerry Lynn, The Dudley Brothers and much more.
title: The Best of Taz: Survive if He Lets You!
